function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for micro-level behaviors such as breathing and touching in COVID-19 transmission scenarios","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation of virus transmission and potential policy decisions","Mitigation":"Incorporate micro-level behaviors into the simulation and validate the accuracy of transmission scenarios","Technologies":"Simulation tools with micro-level behavior customization","People":"Health experts, policymakers","Owner":"Simulation developers and health experts"},{"Description":"Limited flexibility for customizing configurations within the simulation tool","Impact":"Inability to accurately compare and evaluate the effects of interventions on virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enable high flexibility for customizing human behaviors and physical spaces within the simulation tool","Technologies":"Configurable simulation parameters","People":"Users, policymakers","Owner":"Simulation developers"},{"Description":"Focus on small spaces with simple geometry in existing virus transmission simulations","Impact":"Inability to capture the longitudinal aspects of human behaviors at an architectural scale","Mitigation":"Extend the system to cover longitudinal aspects of human behaviors at an architectural scale","Technologies":"Longitudinal simulation models","People":"Health experts, architects, policymakers","Owner":"Simulation developers"}]}
